title: Diversification quotients: Quantifying diversification via risk measures
abstract: arXiv:2206.13679v5 Announce Type: replace  Abstract: We establish the first axiomatic theory for diversification indices using six intuitive axioms: non-negativity, location invariance, scale invariance, rationality, normalization, and continuity. The unique class of indices satisfying these axioms, called the diversification quotients (DQs), are defined based on a parametric family of risk measures. A further axiom of portfolio convexity pins down DQ based on coherent risk measures. DQ has many attractive properties, and it can address several theoretical and practical limitations of existing indices. In particular, for the popular risk measures Value-at-Risk and Expected Shortfall, the corresponding DQ admits simple formulas and it is efficient to optimize in portfolio selection. Moreover, it can properly capture tail heaviness and common shocks, which are neglected by traditional diversification indices. translated_title: 多样化商数：通过风险度量量化多样化
translated_abstract: 我们首次建立了关于多样化指数的公理化理论，使用了六个直观的公设：非负、位置不变性、尺度不变性、合理性、归一化和连续性。满足这些公设的唯一类别指数被称为多样化商数（DQs），并且基于一个参数化的风险度量族来定义。进一步的一个公设的投资组合凸性将DQ固定在基于一致风险度量的特征上。DQ具有许多有吸引力的属性，它可以解决现有指数的几个理论和实践上的局限性。特别是，对于流行的风险度量Value-at-Risk和Expected Shortfall，相应的DQ具有简单的公式，并且在组合选择中优化起来非常高效。此外，它能够正确捕捉尾部的厚重性和共同冲击，这是传统多样化指数所忽视的。当结合金融数据进行说明时，DQ有直观的解释性，其性能能够很好地对应风险的耐受程度。
tldr: 该论文建立了关于多样化指数的公理化理论，提出了一种称为多样化商数（DQs）的指数类别，能够通过风险度量族来量化多样化，并且解决了现有指数的几个局限性。
en_tdlr: The paper establishes an axiomatic theory for diversification indices, introduces a class of indices called diversification quotients (DQs) quantified by a family of risk measures, and addresses several limitations of existing indices.
